message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this truly unique product. Knowing its value, I'm starting the bidding at $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for an item of this caliber.
I appreciate your starting bid, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price for the product considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $900,000 is significantly below its true worth.  To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. This is a considerable compromise, reflecting my desire to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about we settle on $1,050,000?
